title: Patch 10.4 In a Nutshell
body:
Jg Buffs:
Riot said I could play this champion in the jungle. 

Nerfs:
Now it will be harder to use "galaxy brain" Aphelios. Also please do not use Sona or Soraka top. Please consider these new features that encourage playing them support where they belong. 

Sunfire Cape Change:
So Ornn...
